import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import HospitalRegistration from './components/HospitalRegistration'; import ChildRegistration from './components/ChildRegistration'; class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { currentView: 'welcome' }; } // Handle wallet connection handleConnectWallet = () => { if (typeof window.ethereum !== 'undefined') { alert('MetaMask detected! (Connection feature coming next)'); this.setState({ currentView: 'dashboard' }); } else { alert('Please install MetaMask wallet!'); } }; // Handle disconnect handleDisconnect = () => { this.setState({ currentView: 'welcome' }); }; // Change view changeView = (view) => { this.setState({ currentView: view }); }; // Back to dashboard backToDashboard = () => { this.setState({ currentView: 'dashboard' }); }; // Render welcome screen renderWelcomeScreen() { return (

  2. Child Birth Registration: Hospital creates NFT record, sends to parents
  3. Vaccination Records: Authorized hospitals record vaccinations with QR codes
  4. Parent Access: Parents manage and verify their children's records

); } // Render about page renderAboutPage() { return (

About the Vaccination Registry System

🏥 How the System Works

  1. Hospital Registration: Healthcare providers register with their license information
  2. Admin Authorization: System administrators verify and authorize hospitals
  3. Child Birth Registration: Authorized hospitals register newborns and create NFT records
  4. NFT Distribution: Vaccination NFTs are automatically sent to parent wallets
  5. Vaccination Recording: Hospitals record vaccinations with automatic QR code generation
  6. Parent Management: Parents can view and manage their children's records

🔒 Security Features

  • Blockchain Immutability: Records cannot be altered once confirmed
  • Role-Based Access: Only authorized hospitals can create and update records
  • NFT Ownership: Parents own their children's vaccination NFTs
  • QR Verification: Instant verification without revealing personal data
  • Decentralized Storage: IPFS integration for additional medical documents

👥 User Roles

👑 System Admin

Authorize hospitals and manage system settings

🏥 Hospital

Register children and record vaccinations

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Parent

View and manage children's vaccination records

🚀 Development Status

React App: Working
Hospital Registration: ✅ Complete
Child Registration: ✅ Complete
Vaccination Recording: Next Step
Parent Dashboard: Coming Soon

📱 Technology Stack

  • Blockchain: Ethereum with ERC-721 NFT standard
  • Smart Contracts: Solidity with OpenZeppelin libraries
  • Frontend: React.js with Web3 integration
  • Storage: IPFS for decentralized file storage
  • Wallet: MetaMask for blockchain interaction
); } render() { const { currentView } = this.state; // Route to different views switch (currentView) { case 'welcome': return this.renderWelcomeScreen(); case 'dashboard': return this.renderDashboard(); case 'about': return this.renderAboutPage(); case 'hospital-register': return ; case 'child-register': return ; default: return this.renderWelcomeScreen(); } } } export default App;
